idea:
Endimension technology private limited is an impactful, fast-paced and quickly developing organisation. Our startup is incubated in the heart of Mumbai at SINE, IIT Bombay, where we work in a stimulating and focused yet fun environment.
Our research team, engineers and colleagues work with hospitals & healthcare professionals to integrate impactful solutions, by detecting minute abnormalities in medical images, and help patients access treatment as quickly and accurately as possible.
